:::{.def}

[3Blue1Brown by Grant Sanderson](https://www.3blue1brown.com/) has a series of 4 videos on neural networks which is easy to watch, fun, and does an excellent job at explaining the functioning of a simple neural network. In this section, we will watch the first 2 videos as an introduction to what neural networks are and how they learn.

:::
